project.title: Andy Tulett
project.subtitle: Founder and Director of The Focallocal Public Happiness Community
project.text: As a Public Happiness Activist I bring people together around creative ideas, to build projects and Movements which bring a little more peace and well-being into this world.

web.title: Andy Tulett
web.subtitle: Founder and Director of The Focallocal Public Happiness Community
web.text: As a Public Happiness Activist I bring people together around creative ideas, to build projects and Movements which bring a little more peace and well-being into this world.

web.title: Tom McNulty
web.subtitle: Site Reliabilty Engineer
web.text: Site Reliabilty and DevOps Engineer in the Boston, MA area. Tom keeps corners of the internet on and clears the brush to help lay the foundation for projects to be built there.

web.title: Matias Forbord
web.subtitle: DevOps/Full Stack Engineer
web.text: Passionate humanist and engineer working to end poverty. Creating access to work in the Philippine slums.

web.title: Pawel Mordaszewski
web.subtitle: Technical utility player
web.text: Travelling software engineer with a passion for a better world. Recently busy working for the fourth industrial revolution by harnessing autonomous drones using AI analytics sent through IoT on 5G.

web.title: Arty Sidorenko
web.subtitle: Trainee Developer/All-round Information Sponge
web.text: Tech-enthusiast and frequent traveller based in London, UK. Recovering from a past life in financial analysis.

web.title: Sylvain Quendez
web.subtitle: Docuss Founder and Director
web.text: Manager and entrepreneur with broad international experience and wide-ranging technical background. Proven track record in building and directing high performance engineering teams.
